column5: With all the boat strip and paint threads and the supposable "need" for special paints for below water I thought I'd look into what Lund paints their boats with. Much to my surprise... it's the exact same paint I have on my airplane for Lund boats prior to 2005. PPG Concept.. just a good single stage.. 2 part car paint. They are now using PPG... Delta or Delfleet, which is just the next generation of the Concept. No issues on mine after two full season sitting in the water from Early May to Late October. Bottom paint is flawless still.  So if anyone has scratches, etc... here are the paint codes. In the Midland area Dave Doherty at D&S Auto Body has the PPG mix rail in his paint booth.  LUND COLOR CODES   .....................................................  REFINISH CODES COLOR..................OEM..............DELTA...........DELFLEET SILVER...............HSL35830		....DUHS35830		....FDGH35830 MAJESTIC RED....HSL61983		....DUHS61983		....FDGH910947 PLATINUM...........HSL61982		....DUHS61982		....FDGH910948 CLASSIC WHITE..HSL914770		..DUHS914770		..FDGH914770 SANDSTONE........HSL914543		..DUHS914543		..FDGH914543 BLACK.................HSL912854		..DUHS912854		..FDGH912854 BLACK ONYX........HSL912855		..DUHS912855		..FDGH912855 WILDFIRE RED.....HSL912856		..DUHS912856		..FDGH912856 FOREST GREEN....HSL912857		..DUHS912857		..FDGH912857 COBALT BLUE......HSL912858		..DUHS912858		...FDGH912858 ARCTIC WHITE....HSL912859		..DUHS912859		....FDGH912859 PEWTER...............HSL37308		..DUHS37308		.....n/a CHAMPAGNE........HSL65645		..DUHS918807		...FDGH918807 WHITE ONYX..........n/a	...................n/a	..........FDGH915060
I dont see one for the 97 F150 red
Now that was funny.  What a waste of a good swig of rye.LOL
Good to see the paints holdin up on all those lunds and nobody needs the codes!
This site is always good for a laugh.
Thanks for posting that info!... I was looking for a little grey touch up
Are you saying Wayne that the paint on my Lund will not last forever?  And then I actually have to repaint it.  Too much work, I'll just stick to fishing.  Tremclad!!, Bwah ha ha!!!
Nah.. I 'm just sayin I've watched OFC'rs dock their boats and I KNOW there are many with scratches needing touch up !!

Scratches add character!! They show experience........why hide them?  I don't see the code for thier dead grass colour? Or the camo......??  You'd all cringe at my boat........she'a a beaut!! LOL Scratches and dents all over......just the way I like it!!  Sinker
Hey Irishfield, I am trying to decide on what color to paint my boat. Is there anywhere I can go to have a look at the actual colors. Thanks Stan
